channel.title: [508] Woodcutting

item.title: [508] Woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @Trynkillmee Trynkillmee
item.description:
@Trynkillmee wrote:

I’m adding woodcutting to an espeon source.

In objectoption1 I added:

case 1276:
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You swing your axe at the tree.”);
p.requestAnim(875, 0);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You receive some logs.”);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1511, 1);
break;

for every tree

how do i make it so it checks for an axe and sends a message saying you need an axe? thanks

BUMP!!! waited hours now I need this ASAP PLEASE

Read full topic
